messages.message:
Is the new Information Architecture enabled by default now? In Crafting, I’m getting a 302 from `/hub/build/<proj_id>` to `/build/<proj_id>` which implies that the backend is in a “IA enabled” state, but the frontend is showing a blank screen. I can confirm the IA setting isn’t available in settings, nor is the `ENABLE_IA_REDESIGN` cookie in my browser. I’m just a little confused on what I should do to get my Cypress tests to not break =(

cc @Xindi Xu @Jessica
To simplify the gating logic, Xindi merged a change today to make some of the routes what they'll be after IA redesign. It should be deployed to the crafting sandbox now. Can you pull from master?
yep! The feature flag is not enabled by default. The feature flag will only gate 3 routes now. I also added redirect logic in the backend so it 302 for `/hub/build/<proj_id>` is expected
I’m on the latest master but I’ll pull again and redeploy my PR sandbox
